name: Matches & Matrimony: A Pride and Prejudice Tale
notes:
Uses the Ren'Py SDK to run the Big Fish version of the game https://www.bigfishgames.com/games/6170/matches-matrimony-a-pride-and-prejudice-tale/ natively in Linux.
Install the game using the Big Fish Games App https://lutris.net/games/big-fish-games-app/ before running this installer.

merge.src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Matches and Matrimony - A Pride and Prejudice Tale

content:
files:
- file1: https://www.renpy.org/dl/6.11.2/renpy-6.11.2-sdk.tar.bz2
game:
  args: matches
  exe: $GAMEDIR/renpy-6.11.2/renpy.sh
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/renpy-6.11.2
    file: $file1
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/renpy-6.11.2/matches
    src: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Matches and Matrimony - A Pride and Prejudice
      Tale
requires: big-fish-games-app
